product_name: Topo Athletic M-ST Road-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: Ideal for speed training and tempo runs, the lightweight Topo Athletic M-ST Road-Running Shoes feature zero drop from heel to toe for a minimalist feel and excellent connection to the ground. Mesh uppers with printed overlays breathe well to keep your feet cool and comfortable on long runs; mesh linings help move moisture away from your feet. Zero drop from heel to toe encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Removable footbeds feature AEGIS(R) Microbe Shield antibacterial treatment to help deter odors. 6mm-thick EVA midsoles provide enough cushion to protect your feet on medium-distance runs. 3mm-thick rubber outsoles offer good traction for running on roads. Topo Athletic M-ST Road-Running Shoes have a 13mm total stack height.
short_description: Ideal for speed training and tempo runs, the lightweight Topo Athletic M-ST Road-Running Shoes feature zero drop from heel to toe for a minimalist feel and excellent connection to the ground.
